Introducing the JUMBO BOBA ‚Äì Where Bigger is Always Better! 

Prepare to be amazed by the sheer size of our Jumbo Boba! It's like having a whole boba party in your mouth. Each sip is a delightful explosion of flavor and texture, guaranteed to satisfy your boba cravings. These boba, unlike our tapioca balls, are made from coffee and jelly.

These adorable cup holders are only available for a short time, so hurry to TIGER SUGAR and get yours today. Choose from a variety of colors and designs, all featuring your favorite Sanrio character.

Hold on to your boba, we're bringing you the cutest cup holders ever! Our limited-edition Hello Kitty cup holders are the perfect way to show your love of boba and @HelloKitty. Choose from a variety of colors and designs, all featuring your favorite Sanrio character.

But hurry, these cup holders are only available while supplies last! So what are you waiting for? Head to your nearest TIGER SUGAR and get your hands on these adorable cup holders today!

Say hello to the sweetest collab of the summer! TIGER SUGAR and @HelloKitty have teamed up to create the ultimate boba tea experience. Our limited-edition Hello Kitty Crush drink is made with sweet strawberry milk cream, boba pearls, and strawberry flavored chips. It's the perfect way to cool down on a hot day and celebrate your love of Hello Kitty.

Available now at all TIGER SUGAR USA locations! So what are you waiting for? Head to your nearest TIGER SUGAR and try the new Hello Kitty Crush drink today!

Happy New Year 2024! We are incredibly thankful for everyone‚Äôs support over the past year! One question that has often come up is: why does ZERO& have a variety of new fruit tea products, but not a lot of milk tea? This is indeed related to our focus on innovation in the fruit tea category. However, we have always hoped to make a breakthrough in the traditinal milk tea category, offering something different from what‚Äôs available in the market. So, our R&D team dedicated a significant amount of time to explore and test various teas and alternative dairy options, and the entire development process took nearly half a year.

Finally, at the beginning of this new year, we are thrilled to share our brand-new ‚ÄúCoconut Light Milk Tea Series‚Äù with all of you!

Carefully selected high-quality tea base, paired with our healthy signature coconut milk, presents a more balanced fusion of tea and milk flavors. You no longer have to worry about the heaviness and excessive sweetness of traditional milk tea. Enjoy the refreshing coconut aroma and the pure tea essence, without concerns about lactose intoleranceüôå.

Say goodbye to the iconic Korean garlic bread and discover the delight of our Sweet Corn Garlic Bread! A savory classic bagel meets a rich blend of garlic confit, sweet corn kernels, and a creamy mix of cream cheese, parmesan, and garlic sauce.
